Package org.hypermedea.op

Class BaseOperation

java.lang.Object
org.hypermedea.op.BaseOperation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Operation
Direct Known Subclasses:
SynchronousOperation
public abstract class BaseOperation extends Object implements Operation
Implementation of basic operation features, including:
  • management of operation states
  • management of asynchronous calls and blocking calls

    • getForm

      public Map<String,Object> getForm()
      Description copied from interface: Operation
      Return the filled-out form passed as argument to the instantiation of the operation. A form is a collection of key-value pairs (fields) that parameterize the request sent to initiate the operation.
      Specified by:
      getForm in interface Operation
      Returns:
      a form

    • getPayload

      Specified by:
      getPayload in interface Operation
      Returns:
      the currently set payload

    • setTimeout

      public void setTimeout(long timeout)
      Set timeout between request and (first) response.
      Parameters:
      timeout - timeout (in seconds). A timeout of 0s is equivalent to no timeout.

    • setPayload

      Parameters:
      p - a single Jason term

    • setPayload

      public void setPayload(Collection<jason.asSyntax.Literal> p)
      Description copied from interface: Operation
      Fill out the form with a payload. The server may reject it and return CLIENT_ERROR status.
      Specified by:
      setPayload in interface Operation
      Parameters:
      p - payload to send to the server

    • sendRequest

      public void sendRequest() throws OperationAlreadyStartedException, IOException
      Ensure that only a single request is sent. protocol binding-dependent behavior is implemented in sendSingleRequest().
      Specified by:
      sendRequest in interface Operation
      Throws:
      OperationAlreadyStartedException
      IOException

    • getResponse

      public Response getResponse() throws NoResponseException
      Use a semaphore (BlockingDeque of size 1) to implement the expected behavior of Operation.getResponse().
      Specified by:
      getResponse in interface Operation
      Returns:
      the (last) response sent by the server
      Throws:
      NoResponseException - if no response has been received after some timeout or if connection to the server was lost

    • registerResponseCallback

      public void registerResponseCallback(ResponseCallback callback)
      Description copied from interface: Operation
      Register a callback for asynchronous responses sent by the server.
      Specified by:
      registerResponseCallback in interface Operation
      Parameters:
      callback - response callback exposing a method with a Response as argument

    • unregisterResponseCallback

      public void unregisterResponseCallback(ResponseCallback callback)
      Description copied from interface: Operation

      Remove a callback from the list of registered callbacks for the operation.

      If no callback is registered, the operation should end (and connection with the server may be dropped). Any subsequent call to the operation's methods should raise an error.

      Specified by:
      unregisterResponseCallback in interface Operation
      Parameters:
      callback - response callback already registered via Operation.registerResponseCallback(ResponseCallback)

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • getMethod

      protected String getMethod()

    • sendSingleRequest

      protected abstract void sendSingleRequest() throws IOException
      Implementations are protocol binding-dependent. See Operation.sendRequest() for expected behavior.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • end

      protected void end() throws IOException

      This method is called as a side effect of Operation.unregisterResponseCallback(ResponseCallback), if more callback is registered for the operation.

      Some implementations are protocol binding-dependent. The default implementation does nothing.

      Throws:
      IOException

    • onResponse

      protected void onResponse(Response r)
      Pass the input response to the semaphore and notify registered callbacks.
      Parameters:
      r - a response received by the Thing during the operation

    • onError

      protected void onError()
      Pass an empty value to the semaphore and notify registered callbacks of an error.
